tool_description: This API helps you to query for data which is obtained by professional providers who have direct and extensive access to stock quotes, futures, popular indices, Forex, Bitcoin and CFDs to create a financial community site/application, such as : tradingview.com
name: Trading View
title: Trading View

api_list.name: market/get-movers
api_list.description: Get movers in different exchanges and different categories

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : volume_gainers|percent_change_gainers|percent_change_losers|percent_range_gainers|percent_range_losers|gap_gainers|gap_losers|percent_gap_gainers|percent_gap_losers

api_list.name: auto-complete (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get suggestion by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : stock|futures|forex|index|bond|economic|bitcoin|crypto. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : bitcoin,crypto,stock,...

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: exchange
optional_parameters.description: The value of \"value\" field returned in .../exchanges/list endpoint

api_list.name: news/list
api_list.description: List latest news with options and filters

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: List ideas posts related to specified symbol. Ex : NASDAQ:AAPL

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country code, only functionable if the market parameter is stock.

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Leave empty or one of the following : base|stock|cryto|forex|index|futures|bond|economic

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index, for paging purpose

api_list.name: stocks/get-financials
api_list.description: Get financials information related to a ticker or symbol

required_parameters.name: columns
required_parameters.description: One of the following (Separated by comma for multiple options) : optional_parameters.name: screenerName
optional_parameters.description: The value of screenerName field returned in .../countries/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

api_list.name: exchanges/list
api_list.description: List all available and supported exchanges
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trading-view.p.rapidapi.com/exchanges/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trading-view.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trading-view.p.rapidapi.com/exchanges/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trading-view.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: countries/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trading-view.p.rapidapi.com/countries/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trading-view.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trading-view.p.rapidapi.com/countries/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trading-view.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: v2/auto-complete
api_list.description: Get suggestion by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: The offset of records to ignore for paging purpose.

optional_parameters.name: search_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : stock|futures|forex|index|bond|economic|bitcoin|crypto. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : bitcoin,crypto,stock,...

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: exchange
optional_parameters.description: The value of \"value\" field returned in .../exchanges/list endpoint

api_list.name: calendars/get-economic-calendar
api_list.description: Get economic calendar by specific date range and countries

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: The date format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-08-21

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: The date format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-09-05

optional_parameters.name: minImportance
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : -1|0|1

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: countries
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : US|EU|JP|AU|DE|GB|CA|FR|IT|NZ|ES|MX|CH|TR|ZA. Separated by comma for multiple options

api_list.name: ideas/list
api_list.description: List ideas post with options and filters

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Leave empty or one of the following : picked|newest|popular

optional_parameters.name: stock_country
optional_parameters.description: The country code, only functionable if the market parameter is stock.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: Leave empty or one of the following : bond|futures|index|forex|bitcoin|stock

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: List ideas posts related to specified symbol. Ex : NASDAQ:AAPL

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : latest_popular|recent|picked_time

api_list.name: ideas/get-view-count
api_list.description: Get view count related to an ideal post

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: The value of image_url field returned in .../ideas/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

api_list.name: ideas/get-replies
api_list.description: Get replies relating to an ideal post and comment

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: The value of image_url field returned in .../ideas/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

api_list.name: ideas/get-comments
api_list.description: Get comments relating to an ideal post

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: The value of image_url field returned in .../ideas/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

api_list.name: ideas/detail

required_parameters.name: uuid
required_parameters.description: The value of image_url field returned in .../ideas/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

api_list.name: calendars/get-earning-calendar
api_list.description: Get earning calendar by specific date range and exchange

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: The epoch timestamp in seconds. Ex : 1661187600

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: The epoch timestamp in seconds. Ex : 1661619600

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code

optional_parameters.name: screenerName
optional_parameters.description: The value of screenerName returned in .../countries/list endpoint
